ovdesc.p: This file will allow user to define an entity and its extraction rules depending on the type of Application (Security, Account, Forex). I-descriptors fields can be used in the definition.
For example, with the entity currency CCY:
If the currency is for an account (AC) then extract field CURRENCY from the file ACCOUNT.
If the currency is for a security (SC) then extract field SECURITY.CURRENCY from the file SECURITY.MASTER.
If the currency is for a loans and deposits (LD) transaction then extract field CURRENCY from the file LD.LOANS.AND.DEPOSITS.

desc.p: Multi valued field allowing to define multi selection for the same product code. Used for example in the case of the Foreign Exchange to specify if it is the buying ('BUY' input) or selling ('SELL' input) of foreign currency. Option must be set according to SET.POSITION routine. (see SET.POS.RTN field in AM.PARAMETER)
Optional input
0 - 5 alphanumeric characters free format text
This field accepts subroutine name to be processed.
This should be a filename without the "Fxxx" prefix. (Optional input)
Must exist in the STANDARD.SELECTION file
0 - 25 type A (alphanumeric) characters

A pseudonym for an existing field. This type may be used if an existing field name is amended, the previous name should be defined as type P, the FIELD.NO should be set to the new name. This will then ensure that exsiting enquiries and versions still recognize the old name. A pseudonym will assume all the attributes of the field it is linked to in FIELD.NAME.
Contains the ID of the PRODUCT code
A PRODUCT code can be entered only once in the same record.
Mandatory input
Must exist as a PRODUCT id
